summary: Tesla Inc. rolled out its long-promised driverless taxi service to a handful of riders Sunday . The first robotaxi trips were limited to a narrow portion of Tesla’s hometown of Austin . The carmaker hand-picked a friendly crop of initial riders, which featured investors and social-media influencers .  Tesla has relied on word of mouth and media coverage ahead of the robotaxi launch . The unveiling was uncharacteristically low-key for a company that held a “Cyber Rodeo” to mark a Texas factory opening in 2022 . Musk is reorienting the carmaker around hyped-but-still-unproven technologies including self-driving vehicles and humanoid robots .  The launch marks a crucial test for Tesla, which is using only 10 to 20 vehicles at first . The first riders are being charged a flat rate of $4.20 per trip, Musk says . Robotaxis will be available between 6 a.m. and midnight daily within a geofenced area of the city .  Tesla hasn’t said when robotaxi service will open to the general public . Musk has pledged to scale up quickly and expand to other US cities in the near future .  An analyst says the robotaxi user experience was “better than expected” after a member of his team rode in one Sunday . Luxury Counterfeiters keep outsmarting the Makers of $10,000 handbags .

Artificial intelligence is an area of enormous potential for companies and investors . After a few difficult months, AI stocks could resume their 2024 momentum and soar in the second half . Three in particular could lead the way .  Nvidia's revenue surged 69% to $44 billion in the first quarter of the year . The chip giant is making investments in U.S. manufacturing to limit any eventual tariff impact . Nvidia trades for only 33 times forward earnings estimates, down from 50 times just a few months ago .  Trump threatened to impose a 25% tariff on Apple's imported iPhones . Apple has made efforts to diversify its manufacturing, with a plan to move much of it from China to India . All of this has hurt Apple stock, which is down about 20% since the start of the year .  Amazon's performance has been sluggish in recent times amid concerns that tariffs could hurt its e-commerce business and cloud computing unit, Amazon Web Services . The worst-case tariff scenario has been avoided, and the U.S. is making progress on trade agreements . Amazon has revamped its cost structure in recent years after facing pressure from inflation .  Amazon shares trade for 34 times forward earnings estimates, a reasonable level that could prompt investors to buy . AWS has been seeing tremendous growth from its AI efforts, which have helped it reach a $117 billion annual revenue run rate . Tesla started off with about 10 Model Ys and promised to focus on safety . Social media influencers were seen booking and taking rides in the robotaxis in several Austin locations on Sunday .
